snippet: Coughlin, Eli Manning said, used part of a team meeting to urge players not to concern themselves with rumors about a coaching change or potential successors.
abstract: New York Giants are stumbling their way toward the end of a season in which they will miss the playoffs for a third consecutive year and for the fifth time in six years; coach Tom Coughlin acknowledges his future is at risk; quarterback Eli Manning defends Coughlin, pointing to players’ effort and saying team had been close to winning several games.
lead_paragraph: Coughlin, Eli Manning said, used part of a team meeting to urge players not to concern themselves with rumors about a coaching change or potential successors.

headline.main: Giants Try to Ignore Speculation on Tom Coughlin
headline.print_headline: Giants Try to Ignore Speculation on Coughlin
